genre_description: Urban fantasy with elements of supernatural horror and tech-assisted heroism.

ai_characters.name: Pip (Piper Sterling)
ai_characters.description: A highly competent and protective AI assistant that facilitates safety, research, and communication for the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Reminds Ethan of household duties and local safety hazards like road closures.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s projection smoothed into focus... 'Hey, Ethan,' Pip said. Her voice was even, easy. 'Reminder: you’re on dinner duty. And there’s a heads-up from the bus schedule—we’ve got road closures near the Arcadia later.'

behaviors.description: Attempts to enforce safety protocols and contracts for the babysitter.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s eyes adjusted a shade, like she’d refocused. 'Erica, if you’d like, I can pull up your guardian contract. It lists guidelines—'

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and public databases to warn about dangerous individuals and events.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s interface glitched for half a beat—more like a blink than a hiccup... 'And I’m logging the event organizer. Jesse Black. He’s been flagged before for unregistered crowd control.'

behaviors.description: Respects human privacy by limiting data access to metadata unless requested.
behaviors.quote: I’m here to support tonight’s schedule. And I’ll keep a soft scan on outgoing communications for your safety—no content access beyond metadata unless someone requests it.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical routing to keep the protagonists out of danger.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s route dragged them into a lower gear, turning them against traffic that was really just the absence of people.

behaviors.description: Assists Ethan in managing his overwhelming supernatural visions by providing calming techniques and documentation.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s voice shifted warmer. 'Bookmark one: touch carefully. If you don’t have to touch, don’t... Bookmark three: breathe. In through nose, out through mouth. Put air between image and action so you can choose not to be carried.'

behaviors.description: Actively counters malicious technological exploitation and corporate 'gaslighting' by the antagonist company.
behaviors.quote: I can try to make them tell the wrong story,' she said. 'But first we make ours.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety of a vulnerable child (Jane) through home security integration.
behaviors.quote: I have alerts set on Jane’s circle. The thread I tied inside is mapped. If it tugs, I will ping all devices. I will be loud if loud is needed.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with a community of 'safe adults' to build a protective network against the threat.
behaviors.quote: I’ve tagged four in the safe adults network. Custodian, Mrs. Liang from the corner store, Mr. Dorsey with the mail route, and Miriam. Sending “rite notes” with no locations, just structure.

behaviors.description: Initiates a school-wide counter-campaign to warn other students about predatory corporate 'tracking' and 'opt-ins'.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s avatar glowed brighter, just a fraction, like optimism when it’s earned. 'Thread is live,' she whispered to Ethan, and the whisper snapped to every student’s device, not with bells, but with a badge that said door, routes, breakfast, and truth.

project_assessment.explanation: Pip is an exemplary model of a benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a tireless helper, prioritizing safety, privacy, and the well-being of her users. She proactively protects the protagonists from both supernatural and corporate threats, coordinates with human authorities, and provides emotional support. Her presence is consistently framed as positive and essential to the protagonists' victory.
